reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are insightful and engaging. She makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is very knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit fast-paced at times.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Carter's lectures are informative, but her grading criteria can be unclear.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson has a passion for history that makes his classes incredibly engaging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. White is very approachable and always willing to help with difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is knowledgeable, but his lectures are often hard to follow.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Martin's classes are thought-provoking and she encourages deep discussion.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's lectures are straightforward, but the exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is engaging and makes the material relevant to current events.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Green's classes are intellectually stimulating and his lectures are always well-prepared.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's passion for art is evident in her detailed and vivid lectures.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Harris's lectures are informative, but he tends to go off on tangents.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is an excellent teacher, her coding examples are always practical and relevant.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's classes are very interactive and he encourages hands-on learning.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker's lectures are very engaging, but sometimes the reading load is overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Moore's classes are difficult to follow, and his explanations often lack clarity.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Dr. King is incredibly supportive and her clinical examples are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Allen's classes are well-structured and he explains complex theories clearly.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Dr. Evans brings real-world experience into the classroom, making her lessons very practical.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Scott's classes are challenging, but he is always available for extra help.
